creator: miguel.mcnealy@gmail.com
text: Apache is behind corporate proxy and firewall.  Need way to specify ProxyHost and ProxyPort to make OCSP calls.

Is it possible to reference below for this feature:
https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/attachment.cgi?id=19386&action=diff


Line 43 - 54

The rest of the ssl_ocsp.c has proxyHost and proxyPort integrated in the code.  Not sure if this would be reusable in newer version of code.
creator: miguel.mcnealy@gmail.com

text: this is really a bad that oscp requests cannot be done via a http proxy currently. This makes oscp stapling unusable for many setups.
creator: bjoern@j3e.de
